Token.Abstract: (INTERNAL USE) NSOperation for running an audio operation asynchronously.
(INTERNAL USE) Create a new Asynchronous Operation.

Parameter.Name: track
Parameter.Abstract: the audio track to perform the operation on.

Parameter.Name: url
Parameter.Abstract: the URL containing the sound file.

Parameter.Name: seekTime
Parameter.Abstract: the position in the file to start playing at.

Parameter.Name: target
Parameter.Abstract: the target to inform when the operation completes.

Parameter.Name: selector
Parameter.Abstract: the selector to call when the operation completes.
